column5: mammfa kasa nye nyansa kyɛnee bɛkaa hom Nyankopɔn esumasɛm no."

column2: "Na mobɔɔ me tsirmu pɔw dɛ nkyɛ munnkohu biribi wɔ hom mu
column3: gyedɛ Jesus Kraest a wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu no."

column5: nye ahopopo pii mu na menye hom tsenae."

column2: "Na m’asɛm nye m’asɛnka enndua enyansasɛm ndɛfɛdɛfɛw mu
column3: na mbom ɔnam Sunsum ne nyikyerɛ nye tum mu
column5: "amma hom gyedzi eenngyina nyimpa nyansaa mu
column6: na mbom egyina Nyankopɔn tum mu."

column2: "Naaso yɛka nyansa wɔ hɔn a wodzi mu no mu
column3: na nnyɛ nyansa a ɔyɛ wiadze yi dze
column4: anaaso wiadze etumfo a wɔrebɛyɛ gyan dze a:"

column2: "Na mbom yɛka Nyankopɔn nyansaa wɔ esumasɛm mu
column3: nyansa a ohuntae a Nyankopɔn hyɛe too hɔ maa hɛn enyimnyam ansaana wɔrobɔbɔ wiadze no;"

column2: "ɔno na wiadze yi mu etumfo mu obiara ennhu: sɛ wohunii a nkyɛ wɔammbɔ enyimnyam Ewuradze no mbeamudua mu;"
"na mbom dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column3: Dza enyiwa nnhunii na aso nntsee
column5: Ndzɛmba a Nyankopɔn esiesie ama hɔn a wɔdɔ no."

column3: Nyankopɔn nam Sunsum no do eyi akyerɛ hɛn: na Sunsum no pɛɛpɛw adze nyina mu
column4: Nyankopɔn adze a no mu dɔ mu mpo."

column2: "Na nyimpa mu woana na onyim dza ɔwɔ nyimpa mu
column3: gyedɛ nyimpa noara no sunsum a ɔwɔ no mu? Dɛmara na obi nnyim Nyankopɔn dze
nnyɛ wiadze sunsum na yenyae na mbom sunsum a ofi Nyankopɔn mu a
column4: ama yeehu dza Nyankopɔn dze adom hɛn no."

column3: nnyɛ nsɛm a nyimpa nyansaa kyerɛkyerɛ mu
column4: na mbom nsɛm a Sunsum kyerɛkyerɛ mu a: yɛdze sunsum adze to sunsum adze ho."

column2: "Na nyia ɔyɛ honam mu nyimpa nntum nngye dza ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn Sunsum no ne ndzɛmba
"Na nyia ɔyɛ sunsum mu nyimpa dze

column3: dɛ ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ no? Na hɛn dze
